=Links on Points=

*Supported by:* _wicked-charts-wicket15, wicked-charts-wicket5, wicked-charts-jsf21_
----

You can redirect the user to another url when he clicks on a point in a series of your chart by using the class [https://wicked-charts.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/wicked-charts-parent/apidocs/com/googlecode/wickedcharts/highcharts/options/functions/RedirectFunction.html RedirectFunction]:

{{{

options.addSeries(new PointSeries()
  .setData(new Point(1,2)
    .setEvents(new Events()
      .setClick(new RedirectFunction("http://wicked-charts.googlecode.com"))));

}}}
